items.content_html: YouTube-Lite is a simple video streaming platform that provides a seamless experience for users to explore, watch videos. Developed using HTML, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, React, and the powerful YouTube API, YouTube-Lite offers a familiar interface resembling the popular YouTube platform while maintaining a lightweight and efficient design.
items.title: Prachi24599/youtube-lite: YouTube-Lite is a simple video streaming platform that provides a seamless experience for users to explore, watch videos. Developed using HTML, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, React, and the powerful YouTube API, YouTube-Lite offers a familiar interface resembling the popular YouTube platform while maintaining a lightweight and efficient design.
